alert.note: Alert for Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 1:13PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST, SOUTHEASTERN ST. JAMES, NORTHEASTERN TERREBONNE AND NORTHWESTERN LAFOURCHE PARISHES THROUGH 145 PM CDT... At 113 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bayou Cane, or near Houma, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Houma, Thibodaux, Lockport, Mathews, Gray, Raceland, Bayou Cane, Schriever, Des Allemands, Chackbay, South Vacherie, Chauvin, and Dulac. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
